author: p0W3RH311
body:
Step to reproduce

```
PowerShell 7.0.0-rc.1
Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.

https://aka.ms/powershell
Type 'help' to get help.

   A new PowerShell preview release is available: v7.0.0-rc.2
   Upgrade now, or check out the release page at:
     https://aka.ms/PowerShell-Release?tag=v7.0.0-rc.2

(U)pgrade to v7.0.0-rc.2 (N)o (A)sk Me next session
```

if user type U PS upgrade if user type No the prompt not display in next session

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as external and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been be closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: prompt to upgrade
